name: The Respawn Banter
description:
"I SAID: this is not a dream. You actually DIED. And in a pitiful way, if I may add"

The chosen hero of the prophecy must save the world again! 
This should be a normal story, if it wasn't for the fact that the hero sucks at not dying. 
...and the hero doesn't want to be one.
...and the life goddess is somewhat moody.
...and slimes won't let you read (?)

The Respawn Banter is a comedy game set in a fantasy world, about a hero and a life goddess arguing talking every time he dies.

Dying was never this funny!

While you explore, every single time you die a new discussion in the afterworld will take place, even when you die multiple times in the same way. 

Experience lots of funny exchanges between the chosen hero and the goddess of life!
"Is this a dream?"  "The prophet was a fraud?" "Slimes can really get drunk?"

Also, not dying it's not as simple as it sounds. This world... is unfair sometimes.

Made by RPG Waldorf for the Indie Game Maker Contest: Rebirth

With the help of Riakare for the Characters Portraits

Tileset - Cazwolf

Plugins - Visustella, Galv, Mog, Theoallen

Complete credits in the game folder.
